lead_paragraph: Pep Guardiola knew the question was coming and when Jose Mourinho's name was mentioned in his first news conference as Manchester City manager on Friday it was patted away nonchalantly.

headline.print_headline: It's Not About Me and Mourinho, Says City Boss Guardiola
headline.main: It's Not About Me and Mourinho, Says City Boss Guardiola

snippet: Pep Guardiola knew the question was coming and when Jose Mourinho's name was mentioned in his first news conference as Manchester City manager on Friday it was patted away nonchalantly....
